content.rendered:
TTE collaborated with Al Gurg Building Services (AGBS) for a solar project aimed at reducing the utility energy consumption and minimizing the operation cost of the facility.

AGBS manufactures welded wire mesh, cut and bend deformed steel bars and trades various steel items. The AGBS factory was built in 1962 and after a detailed energy audit, TTE proposed the installation of a 912kWp full Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) rooftop solar system, designed to cater to 65% of the energy needs of factory with the rest being from the DEWA Grid.
